post.body: Great! Any other Zazzlers there? Gotta go bundle up & walk dogs. Star t/cat has released my arm, feeling is coming back
Hooray for breaking your record. Now you'll have to let the keyboard cool off from all that rapid fire. :)
Yeah! Just take it one day at a time & you'll make it.
lol, my Dad and brother are more evolved, but I had to have my wisdom teeth surgically removed, teeth took after Mom, bummer
Like your frozen dinner lens & commented. Are you planning a series, favorite link destination?
I got that over capacity screen yesterday
oh, you mean the stores :) still sleepy, duh. You're right, I guess Zazzle 1st, that's easier. Etsy after holidays for new year
yep, going to make another cup of something right now!
Suppose some think it's publicizing their lens, but it gets annoying. More than 2 squidcasts a day is too much & I ignore them.
Just started tagfoot & had turned on 1 to see how it worked. Just turned it off. You're right, it's worse than multiple squidcasts
zazzlers come add your gallery link to the plexo: http://tinyurl.com/8s2wh9 Get more visits, maybe more sales
Opened new zazzle gallery:http://www.zazzle.com/lalagniappe learned to never edit one while logged on as other&always keep text file current
Trying to type with a cat on my wrist. she's comfee, it's cold. must cook today, stuffed mirlitons: http://www.squidoo.com/mirliton_recipes
I vote for A Day of Hope in the Squidoo Twitterdrive for Charity! 1 vote=$1 donated. http://tr.im/24c2 #squidoogives
Morning, Just added new plexo to Wings of Winter: http://www.squidoo.com/birds-of-winter Come see the birds & add your winter bird lenses
2nd Chance & Rio inform me that I must get dressed & take them outdoors or they will leave a present on the floor! must go!
Trying to decide which to do: open a 2nd Zazzle Gallery or 1st Etsy store. Zazzle'd be quicker but have crafts made, Mardi Gras pins, etc
agrh, got back from holiday & niece's graduation (Masters) trip after 1 am. Moving very slow, need more coffee or tea or to go back to bed
I vote for Food for Everyone in the Squidoo Twitterdrive for Charity! 1 vote=$1 donated. http://tr.im/24c2 #squidoogives
I vote for Diabetes Research Inst. in the Squidoo Twitterdrive for Charity! 1 vote=$1 donated. http://tr.im/24c2 #squidoogives
